attributes.action: review the costs and administration of the warm front scheme
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the under signed request that an equiry be carried into the administration of the warm front scheme. In that many applications are subject to lenghty delays as a direct result of the inefficiency uf EAGA the organisation that currently administers the scheme. We would also ask that a review be carried out of the labour costs set by DAFRA for the work carried out by the independant contractors as well as the standard of workmanship.
